line.comment: * Nomad special search routine favors trading stations first
* AI sees everything. Player cheats a bit also, for performance reasons.
* Search again with docks if we haven't found any factory. Only useful for Traders.
* now Nomads skip their special search routine

sval.val: Nomad special search routine favors trading stations first
AI sees everything. Player cheats a bit also, for performance reasons.
Search again with docks if we haven't found any factory. Only useful for Traders.
now Nomads skip their special search routine
